data.name: FixNFiberPlusImportantInformationPara1_Link1Text
data.value: Happiness Guarantee full details

data.name: FixNFibrePlusBannerImageFilename
data.value: electricalwiringcover

data.name: FixNFibrePlusDescPara1
data.value: Do lots of people use your home internet at the same time? Then our fastest Fibre Plus broadband might be for you. With unlimited downloads and an average speed of 63Mbps, it's great for streaming HD movies, playing games online and downloading larger files.

data.name: FixNFibrePlusDescPara2
data.value: Line rental is included and we have a range of call packages to suit you, whether you want to make local, national, mobile or international calls.

data.name: FixNFibrePlusHeader
data.value: Boost your internet up to {0}Mbps

data.name: FixNFibrePlusImportantInformationHeader
data.value: Fibre Plus broadband – important information

data.name: FixNFibrePlusImportantInformationHeaderAlt
data.value: Fibre Plus broadband – important information

data.name: FixNFibrePlusImportantInformationPara1_1
data.value: If you leave us within 18 months of your start date, we’ll send you a pre-paid envelope to return your router. If you don’t send your router back within 30 working days of getting this envelope, we’ll add a charge of £54 to your account. The broadband speeds quoted above are average speeds at times of peak usage. Broadband speeds and unlimited downloads are subject to our

data.name: FixNFibrePlusImportantInformationPara1_2
data.value: and

data.name: FixNFibrePlusImportantInformationPara1_3
data.value: policies. Actual speeds are dependent upon length and quality of the copper line between your home and your exchange or street cabinet as well as environmental factors within you home such as Wi-Fi interference, in-home wiring and congestion on the service you’re accessing. Customers signing up for SSE fixed-term broadband & phone Bundles can leave their contract without early termination charges if, within the first 60 days, they’re not happy with any aspect of the service they’ve received, and we’ve been unable to fix the problem.

data.name: FixNFibrePlusModalProductName
data.value: Fibre Plus broadband

data.name: FixNFibrePlusModalSavingsText
data.value: Save £9 a month (£162 over 18 months). £162 saving is based on £9 discount for 18 months for Fibre Plus broadband (18 x £9 = £162), when compared to buying Unlimited Fibre Plus, our equivalent standalone broadband product (£26 per month).

data.name: FixNFibrePlusModalTagline
data.value: Go faster and save

data.name: FixNFibrePlusSavingsCalculatorPara1
data.value: £162 saving is based on £9 discount for 18 months for Fibre broadband (18 x £9 = £162), when compared to buying Unlimited Fibre, our equivalent standalone broadband product (£22 per month).

data.name: FixNFibrePlusSavingsPara_PlusPackageAdded
data.value: £162 saving is based on £9 discount for 18 months for Fibre Plus broadband (18 x £9 = £162), when compared to buying Unlimited Fibre Plus, our equivalent standalone broadband product (£26 per month).

data.name: FixNFibrePlusSubHeader1
data.value: With Fibre Plus broadband, you’ll get:

data.name: FixNFibrePlusSubHeader1Bullet1
data.value: Our price promise to you: zero price hikes during your 18-month contract

data.name: FixNFibrePlusSubHeader1Bullet2
data.value: Unlimited downloads

data.name: FixNFibrePlusSubHeader1Bullet3
data.value: Wireless router

data.name: FixNFibrePlusSubHeader1Bullet4
data.value: Line rental included (excludes additional calls and call features)

data.name: FixNFibrePlusSubHeader1Bullet5
data.value: Our Happiness Guarantee, so if you’re not completely satisfied with our service, you can leave for free within the first 60 days

data.name: FixNFibrePlusSubHeader2
data.value: Your estimated maximum download speed for

data.name: FixNFibrePlusTagline
data.value: Upgrade to our Fibre Plus broadband. With unlimited downloads and an average speed of 63Mbps, it's great for streaming HD movies, playing games online and downloading larger files.

data.name: FixNProtectPlusBannerImageFilename
data.value: electricalwiringcover

data.name: FixNProtectPlusDescPara1
data.value: If your heating breaks down, we’ll be there for you – round the clock.

data.name: FixNProtectPlusHeader
data.value: Get full heating cover 24/7, boiler service included

data.name: FixNProtectPlusImportantInformationHeader
data.value: Heating Cover – important information

data.name: FixNProtectPlusImportantInformationHeaderAlt
data.value: Heating Cover – important information

data.name: FixNProtectPlusImportantInformationPara1
data.value: The price for Heating Cover includes 20% VAT and Insurance Premium Tax. Heating Cover has a 12-month fixed-term contract which begins on the next working day after your energy supply switches to us.

data.name: FixNProtectPlusImportantInformationPara2
data.value: After 12 months, you'll pay the standard price for Heating Cover (currently £23.95). We'll remind you before the end of your contract that your package price will change.

data.name: FixNProtectPlusImportantInformationPara3
data.value: You’ll be contacted to arrange an initial system inspection.

data.name: FixNProtectPlusImportantInformationPara4_1
data.value: Parts and labour are subject to terms and conditions found in the

data.name: FixNProtectPlusImportantInformationPara4_2
data.value: and the

data.name: FixNProtectPlusImportantInformationPara5
data.value: This policy is for owners of domestic properties only. Retail, commercial and other premises used for business are not eligible.

data.value: Download the SSE Home Services Policy Booklet

data.name: FixNProtectPlusModalProductName
data.value: Heating Cover

data.name: FixNProtectPlusModalSavingsText
data.value: Save £60 over 12 months. £60 saving is based on a £5 discount for 12 months for Heating Cover (12 x £5 = £60), when compared to buying Heating Cover separately (£23.95 per month).

data.name: FixNProtectPlusModalTagline
data.value: Full central heating cover 24/7, boiler service included

data.name: FixNProtectPlusSavingsCalculationPara1
data.value: £114 saving is based on Heating Breakdown being free for 12 months compared to the standard price when bought separately (£9.50 a month): £9.50 x 12 = £114.

data.name: FixNProtectPlusSavingsPara_PlusPackageAdded
data.value: £60 saving is based on a £5 discount for 12 months for Heating Cover (12 x £5 = £60), when compared to buying Heating Cover separately (£23.95 per month).

data.name: FixNProtectPlusSubHeader1
data.value: With Heating Cover, you’ll get:

data.name: FixNProtectPlusSubHeader1Bullet1
data.value: 24-hour emergency repairs to your boiler and central heating system, parts and labour included

data.name: FixNProtectPlusSubHeader1Bullet2
data.value: Unlimited call-outs

data.name: FixNProtectPlusSubHeader1Bullet3
data.value: Annual boiler service (worth £90)

data.name: FixNProtectPlusSubHeader1Bullet4
data.value: 12-month contract with cover starting on the next working day after your energy supply switches to us

data.name: FixNProtectPlusTagline
data.value: Upgrade to our Heating Cover and you’ll not only get 24/7 central heating cover with unlimited call-outs, all parts and labour included. We’ll also give you an annual boiler service.
